mapper.select:
select br.no, br.title, br.content, br.hit, to_char(br.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI') regDate, us.name, br.user_no userNo from board br, users us where br.user_no = us.no
and br.title like '%${value}%'
order by br.no desc

select ort.rn, ort.no, ort.title, ort.content, ort.hit, ort.regDate, ort.userNo, ort.name from (select rownum rn, ot.no, ot.title, ot.content, ot.hit, ot.regDate, ot.userNo, ot.name from (select br.no, br.title, br.content, br.hit, to_char(br.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI') regDate, us.name, br.user_no userNo from board br, users us where br.user_no = us.no order by br.no desc) ot ) ort where rn >= #{startRnum} and rn <= #{endRnum}

select br.no, br.title, br.content, br.hit, to_char(br.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI') regDate, us.name, br.user_no userNo from board br, users us where br.user_no = us.no and br.no = #{no} order by no desc
